room_title: Escape room "Serial Killer" by Escape Canton in Canton
review: I was very nervous going into the serial killer room. Our attendant (3:45 PM 2/9) was extremely helpful! She was able to calm me down and tell me what to expect without giving anything away in the room. If it hadn't been for her I would not have gone in and had such a fun experience! The actual escape room was very fun and challenging. We had a hard time but we escaped! Thanks for a fun afternoon!

room_title: Escape room "Serial Killer" by Escape Canton in Canton
review: We had a blast doing the Serial Killer room this weekend! I had a request for a party in August, and the team was so accommodating. You will NOT regret going!

room_title: Escape room "Serial Killer" by Escape Canton in Canton
review: My husband and I had the best date night ever tonight! We did the Serial Killer room (highly recommended) and the Safehouse. We had a blast and can't wait to come back for more!
